title: Architecture Merge Reflection
purpose: Capture transition from extension merge work to intelligence pivot

messages.author: ai
messages.content: Extension merge status: overlay stable, event timeline integrated, risk remains on DOM volatility.

messages.author: user
messages.content: If volatility remains we shift investment elsewhere.

messages.author: ai
messages.content: Alternate investment: conversation intelligence platform leveraging pattern mining vs UI injection.

messages.author: user
messages.content: Yes transition focus. Document merge lessons then move.

summaries.micro: Assistant reports extension status with risk assessment; user considers strategic pivot.
summaries.macro: Technical status reporting enables informed strategic decision-making about future investment.
insights: Status reports should include risk evaluation
recommendations: Embed risk assessment in all status updates
